trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Garner
There was one other sighting in Garner on or around October 26th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsOct 26, 2011 6-6:30 am EST Garner, NC I woke up and was talking to my partner who just went into the bathroom to take a shower. I opened my blinds as I normally do, looked outside and saw a white orb just flying horizontal and then disappeared. I called him over to see it also, he saw it. Then I put on my pants and went to the screened porch and noticed a second one, same size (white orb) taking the same path and then it just disappeared. A lot quicker then the first one. Waited around for 20 more minutes to see if I noticed another one. Nothing else.
